attributes.action: VAT Registration Delays and Compensation for Delays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We submitted our VAT registration on the 12th september - yet continue to await our VAT number.

We have been one of the unforunate few to have our application reviewed with further checks, although we have to account for VAT.

This has meant that we have to include VAT in our prices, but unable to issue invoices with a breakdown. This is a large administrative burden on small companies.

The government should compensate businesses who have to wait more than one month for their VAT number at a decent rate per day (i.e. £50 - £100 per day) over the 30 day mark. This will give HMRC an incentive to fast track applications.
